title: Basic sushi roll
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) uncooked short-grain rice', '3 tablespoons rice vinegar', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '4 nori seaweed sheets', '1/2 cucumber, peeled, cut into small strips', '2 tablespoons pickled ginger', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and cut into small strips', '225g (8 oz) smoked salmon, crab meat or tuna, flaked']
